articles.author: Edd Straw
articles.title: What Sainz revealed about his recovery ahead of F1 return - The Race
articles.description: Carlos Sainz will return to Formula 1 action in Friday practice at the Australian Grand Prix just 14 days after having an appendectomy, confident that his “strong recovery plan” means he will be fully fit for the whole weekend
